zone.line: Scene — Heaven. Jupiter on his throne
Ye congregated Powers of Heaven who share
The glory & the strength of him ye serve
All else has been subdued to me — alone
The soul of man, like unextinguished fire 5
Yet burns towards Heaven with fierce reproach &
In tameless insurrection, which might make
Our antique empire insecure, though built
On eldest faith, & Hell's coeval, fear; 10
And though my curses thro the pendulous air
Like snow on herbless peaks, fall flake by flake
And cling to it — though under my wrath's
